transcript: if you get no hate you are not successful in achieving things no one hates you from above I had a performance coach tell me this he said hatred isn't something you avoid it is a requisite for success but in terms of like my ability to deal with the naysayers I feel like I'm pretty good at it like it doesn't really bug me very much and I think in large part it was because of how it's framed at least how it was framed for me early on which is that
